text: The Family Channel is an American general entertainment television network owned by Get After It Media, and based in Chattanooga, Tennessee. It was formerly known as My Family TV. In December 2013, Luken Communications rebranded MyFamilyTV as The Family Channel. "The Family Channel" name was formerly used by the cable channel owned by Christian Broadcasting Network that became Freeform (now owned by Disney 15 years later) in January 2016; outside of some shared public domain programming once aired in the CBN/Family Channel era of Freeform, the two networks have no relation to each other. Category:American television channels Category:2008 establishments in the United States
title: The Family Channel (American TV network, founded 2008)
